scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules bun.lockb bun.lock && bun --filter='*' clean
scripts.dev: RUNTIME=bun docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml -f docker-compose.bun.yml up
scripts.migrate:create: docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml up -d postgres && bun --filter='*' run migrate:create
scripts.migrate:down: docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml up -d postgres && bun --filter='*' run migrate:down
scripts.migrate:init: docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml up -d postgres && bun --filter='*' run migrate:init
scripts.migrate:up: docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml up -d postgres && bun --filter='*' run migrate:up
scripts.seed: docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml up -d postgres && bun --filter='*' run seed
